attributes.action: A467 Drain Improvements Against Surface Water
attributes.additional_details:
The A467 is a busy dual carriageway in Wales just off junction 28 of the motorway. However this stretch of road has not got adequate drainage infrastructure in place to deal with the sudden build up of surface water on the carriageway after rainfall.

This is extremely dangerous and is costing lives. Adequate drainage MUST be installed on this road, as a matter of urgency, We cannot put a cost on peoples lives!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Welsh Government.
